welcome.heading: Get the beta on any crag
welcome.description: Real-time conditions, community reports, and route information for crags worldwide

chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask about any crag or sector...
chat.clearChatConfirm: Clear your chat? This will remove all messages from the current conversation.
chat.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all chat history? This cannot be undone.

reasons.tempTooHigh: Temperature too high - fingers may slip
reasons.lowHumidityGranite: Low humidity aids friction on granite
reasons.readyInHours: Will be ready to climb in ~{{hours}} hours

warnings.highHumidity: High humidity ({{humidity}}%) - rock can be slippery
warnings.wetDangerousSandstone: Rock is currently wet - dangerous to climb (sandstone becomes weak when wet)
warnings.wetSlippery: Rock is currently wet - slippery conditions
warnings.veryHighWinds: Very high winds ({{wind}}) - danger of blown off

disambiguation.foundMultipleAreas: Found {{count}} climbing areas for "{{location}}". Please choose one:
disambiguation.foundMultipleLocations: Found multiple locations for "{{location}}". Please choose one:

footer.description: Free climbing conditions for everyone. Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the climbing community.
footer.attribution: Data from Open-Meteo, OpenBeta, and <osmLink>OpenStreetMap contributors</osmLink>. Community-powered reports.

features.heading: Everything You Need
features.subheading: Comprehensive climbing conditions at your fingertips, completely free

realTimeWeather.title: Real-time Weather
realTimeWeather.description: Accurate forecasts from Open-Meteo with sun/shade calculations for specific sectors

chatInterface.title: Chat Interface
chatInterface.description: Natural language queries powered by AI. Ask in any language, get instant answers

communityReports.title: Community Reports
communityReports.description: Share conditions, safety alerts, access changes, beta, and more. Help fellow climbers with real-time updates across multiple categories

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Any crag or sector worldwide via OpenBeta database integration

worksOffline.title: Works Offline
worksOffline.description: Local-first design. Save data offline and sync across devices with a sync key

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Anonymous by default. No accounts required. Your data stays yours

dialog.fullAnalysis: Full weather analysis and climbing conditions forecast
dialog.lowRisk: ‚úÖ Low risk - rock should stay dry
dialog.noOptimalConditions: No optimal conditions in the next 5 days
dialog.checkHourlyForecast: Check hourly forecast for more details
dialog.weatherDisclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Weather conditions can change rapidly. Always monitor forecasts before heading out and check conditions on arrival.

timeContext.earlyStartRecommended: Early start recommended to beat the heat

notification.title: Sync Key Created
notification.description: We've generated a unique key to sync your favourites and chat across devices.

banner.title: Your data syncs across devices
banner.description: Your favourites, reports, and chat history are saved locally and can sync to other devices using your sync key.

syncExplainer.title: How Sync Works
syncExplainer.description: Keep your data in sync across all your devices seamlessly and securely.

syncKey.title: Unique Sync Key
syncKey.description: Each user gets a secure, unique key to sync their data across devices.

multiDevice.title: Multi-Device Access
multiDevice.description: Access your favourites and chat history from any device by using your sync key.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data is encrypted and only accessible with your sync key. No account required.

stats.title: Your Stats
stats.description: Your activity and contributions to the beta.rocks community
stats.encourageReports: Share your local knowledge by posting reports about crag conditions!
stats.thankYou: Thanks for contributing to the climbing community!

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile, sync key, and preferences

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.description: Your name shown on reports and confirmations (optional)
displayName.savedDescription: Your display name has been updated successfully
displayName.saveFailedDescription: Could not save your display name. Please try again

units.title: Units & Measurements
units.description: Choose your preferred units for weather and climbing data
units.systemDescription: Quick presets for common unit systems
units.savedDescription: Your unit preferences have been updated successfully
units.saveFailedDescription: Could not save your unit preferences. Please try again

syncKey.title: Sync Key
syncKey.description: Use this key to sync your favourites and settings across devices
syncKey.label: Your Sync Key
syncKey.qrDescription: Scan this QR code on another device to sync your data
syncKey.restoreDescription: Already have a sync key? Paste it here to restore your data
syncKey.restoreSuccessDescription: Your data will be restored after reload
syncKey.restoreError: Invalid sync key format. Please check and try again.

saveNote.title: Save Your Sync Key
saveNote.description: We recommend saving your sync key in a secure location like your Notes app or password manager. You'll need it to restore your data on other devices.

warning.title: Keep your sync key private
warning.description: Anyone with your sync key can access your favourites and settings. Don't share it publicly.

syncKey.emailPrivacy: We don't store your email - it's only used once to send your sync key.
syncKey.emailFailedDescription: Please try again or copy your sync key manually.
syncKey.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone
dangerZone.deleteProfileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This will permanently remove all your data including favourites, chat history, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteFailed: Failed to delete profile. Please try again.

favorites.title: Your Favourite Crags
favorites.emptyMessage: You haven't added any favourite crags yet
favorites.emptyHint: Click the star button on any conditions card to add it to your favourites

reports.category: What would you like to report?

categoryDescriptions.safety: Loose bolts, rockfall, broken holds, hazards
categoryDescriptions.access: Closures, parking changes, seasonal restrictions, bird nests, insects
categoryDescriptions.climbing_info: Rebolting, hardware updates, route changes, permadraws
categoryDescriptions.other: Anything else that doesn't fit above

reports.detailsRequired: Please provide details about this report

placeholders.conditions: E.g., East sector still wet, trail muddy, crack sipping...
placeholders.safety: E.g., Loose bolt on Route X, rockfall hazard near main wall...
placeholders.access: E.g., Gate closed until May, new parking lot behind library...
placeholders.climbing_info: E.g., Route X rebolted with stainless steel bolts, new permadraws installed, anchor upgraded...
placeholders.facilities: E.g., Toilet available at parking, no water source nearby...
placeholders.other: Describe what you'd like to report...

reports.readyToPost: Profile created! You're ready to post your report.
reports.loginToConfirm: Please set up your profile to confirm reports
reports.confirmFailed: Failed to confirm report. Please try again.
reports.observationDateHelp: You can report conditions up to 7 days back
